hero.title: Axiome Startup Ecosystem

hero.subtitle2: Our Launch Token powers every project we create.

coinflip.title: Heads or Tails — Live PvP Game
coinflip.subtitle: A real-time crypto PvP game where players compete against each other. Transparent mechanics. Provably fair. Instant rewards.

headsOrTails.title: Heads or Tails
headsOrTails.desc: PvP coin flip. Provably fair. 50/50. Winner takes 90%.

launchToken.title: Launch Token — Fuel of Our Ecosystem
launchToken.subtitle: The Launch Token is the core utility asset powering every project within our ecosystem. Used for participation, governance proposals, future tournaments, and ecosystem incentives.

community.title: Build With Us
community.subtitle: Launch Token holders can propose new ideas and contribute to future development. Our ecosystem grows together with the community.

vision.title: Long-Term Vision
vision.text: We are building a multi-project startup ecosystem inside Axiome. Each product strengthens the utility of Launch Token. Our mission is to create sustainable Web3 products — not hype.

why.title: Why this exists
why.problemText1: Creating tokens is easy. Understanding them isn't.
why.problemText2: Most tokens launch without context: no official links, no clear description, no history, no community review — and trust collapses.
why.solutionText1: A verified profile layer for every token.
why.solutionText2: Axiome Launch adds project pages, token passports, community discussion, and transparent economics — so good projects stand out.

features.title: What you can do on Axiome Launch
features.subtitle: Everything a token needs to build trust — from creation to community feedback.

tokenProfiles.title: Token Profiles
tokenProfiles.desc: Rich pages with official links, update history, and community activity.

ownerVerification.desc: Claim a token page by connecting your wallet and signing once.

overview.title: Axiome Startup Ecosystem
overview.subtitle: A community-driven ecosystem for tokens and projects on Axiome blockchain.
overview.description: Axiome Launch combines token discovery, project creation, and Heads or Tails — a live PvP game — into one ecosystem. Create projects, discuss ideas, explore tokens, and play.
overview.card1Desc: Full identity for every token with verified links
overview.card2Desc: PvP coin flip game — 50/50, instant matches
overview.card3Desc: Create projects and discuss with the community

coinflip.title: Heads or Tails
coinflip.subtitle: PvP coin flip game on Axiome. Two players bet LAUNCH, choose heads or tails, reveal — winner takes 90%, 10% platform commission.
coinflip.howDesc: Simple 50/50 mechanics. Both players commit their choice on-chain; the reveal determines the winner.
coinflip.step1Desc: Set your bet amount (min 1 LAUNCH) and choose heads or tails. Or join an existing open bet.
coinflip.step2Desc: Another player joins your bet with the same amount and the opposite side.
coinflip.step3Desc: Both players reveal their choice on-chain. The outcome is determined by the protocol.
coinflip.step4Desc: Winner receives 90% of the total pot. 10% goes to the platform.
coinflip.step5Desc: Invite friends — earn 3%, 1.5%, or 0.5% of the pot for 3 referral levels.
coinflip.commissionDesc: 10% of each pot goes to the platform. Winner gets 90% of the total.
coinflip.securityDesc: All logic is on-chain. No custody of funds — smart contract holds stakes until reveal.
coinflip.paramOneClick: 1-Click Play: Authz delegation for 30 days (no sign per game)
coinflip.referralDesc: Earn a share of the pot when your referrals play:

token.title: LAUNCH Token
token.subtitle: Utility token for the Axiome ecosystem. Used in Heads or Tails, token discovery, and future governance.

projects.createDesc: Publish your project idea, description, and links. Get feedback from the community.
projects.commentsDesc: Comment on tokens and projects. Community-driven signal and ratings.

vision.title: Long-term vision
vision.text: We're building a sustainable Web3 ecosystem: real products (Heads or Tails), real utility (LAUNCH), and community-driven discovery. No hype — just tools that work.

disclaimer.text: LAUNCH is a utility token. Heads or Tails involves risk — only bet what you can afford to lose. We do not promise returns. Play responsibly.

page.title: Lock LAUNCH
page.subtitle: Lock your LAUNCH tokens to unlock platform tiers, premium features, and community governance participation.
page.disclaimer: Locking is a voluntary commitment. Tokens remain in your wallet but must maintain the required balance for the lock duration. Tier access is revoked if the balance drops below the locked amount.

tiers.title: Tier Comparison
tiers.subtitle: Higher tiers unlock more features. Lock more LAUNCH for longer to reach higher tiers.
